name: Idle Haunted House
description:
You have been an evil man all through your life. And, when death came to you, you did not stop being evil. You do not want anyone to live in your house. You do not want any one to take away your privacy, even when you are dead!

Haunt them! Haunt them out! Scare the *** out of them!

Idle Haunted House is about haunting the people in the house you used to live in. The goal is to scare them out. You can do so by Tapping and unlocking your friendly monsters. Enjoy the experience of haunting people and scaring the **** out of them.
